Solomon Lartey bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Activa Insurance site na 2017 ruo 2020.
Solomon Lartey gụrụ akwụkwọ na Accra Academy maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya. O nwetara nzere bachelọ na mahadum Ghana.  Lartey gara n'ihu maka Masters in Business Administration na Mahadum Bradford.
Lartey malitere ọrụ ya na Enterprise Insurance na Ghana.

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na London Market dị ka onye njikwa nkwupụta na nkwupụta ihe ọghọm Planet.  Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere mkpuchi mkpuchi na Brooklands Financial Services Limited.  Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mgbazinye ego na mkpuchi mkpuchi na Simple Group dị na Mitcham, Surrey, United Kingdom wee nwee otu ọnọdụ na Bryant na Menson UK Limited (onye nnọchite anya Mortgage Broking Services Limited na Manchester.
N'afọ 2008, ọ laghachiri Ghana wee sonye na Global Alliance Insurance dị ka Operations Manager.

Na 2009, a họpụtara ya onye isi ọrụ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị Global Alliance site na Inshọransị International Activa.  N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Lartey osote onye isi nchịkwa nke Activa.  Na 2017, Lartey ghọrọ onye so na kọmitii onye isi nke Group Activa na onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ mkpuchi ya, Activa International Insurance.
